ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Protocol *EQ TCP *AND ( ( ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ CLOSED_WAIT *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ FIN_WAIT1 *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ FIN_WAIT2 *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *GT 1000 ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ CLOSED *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *GT 1000 ) ) ) ) *OR ( *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_Protocol *EQ TCP *AND *VALUE KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_State *EQ CLOSING *AND *COUNT KLZ_Sockets_Detail.Socket_UID *GT 1000 ) )
